title: Tire Store Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TireMart_4816.png)

I have been trying to find what font this is for the owner. Having a hard time finding the M that matches.

Font: 

 Brody
author: aynor135

comments.content: It looks very close to **[Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725051139/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Brody%20D%20-%20Regular&fid=6dd234e981487bde63373c12c2c13718&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Tire%20Mart&fit=1)** by Harold Broderson [1953] available from URW++, Linotype and others
